title: Drawing, "Design for a Soup Tureen (plan)", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, green color pencil, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp: in black ink at upper right: 67
dimensions: 23.2 X 47.6 cm (9 1/8 X 18 3/4 in.), irregular sheet
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Oval shaped tureen drawn in plan surmounted by two arched lid hadles indicated in green color pencil to be executed in onyx (see elevation, 1995-164-31). The lid with a reeded lip, flanked by figure-8 shaped handles with two cut-out finger holes. Underdrawing in graphite of tureen in golden section.
Elevation of soup tureen in Puiforcat collection (1995-164-41).
Puiforcat Fabrication #: 67
